profile.title: User Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and track your usage.

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your password and two-factor authentication.

errors.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 8 characters long.

totp.title: Two-Factor Authentication (TOTP)
totp.description: Add an additional layer of security to your account.

setup.scan: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app.
setup.enterToken: Enter the token from your app

usage.title: Token Usage Statistics
usage.description: Here is a summary of your token consumption.

daily.title: Usage Last 30 Days
daily.noData: No usage data for the last 30 days.

billingAndUsage.title: Billing and Usage
billingAndUsage.description: Manage your billing information and track your token usage.

channels.title: Channel Management
channels.selectProviderDescription: Select the provider for this channel
channels.descriptiveName: Give your channel a descriptive name
channels.selectMultipleModels: Hold Ctrl (Windows) or Command (Mac) to select multiple models
channels.noProvidersAvailable: No providers available. Please add a provider first.
channels.noModelsForSelectedProviders: No models available for the selected providers.
channels.selectProviderFirst: Please select a provider first to see available models.
channels.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
channels.shareChannelDescription: When shared, other users can use this channel but cannot modify it or see the key

keys.title: API Key Management
keys.nameDescription: Give your key a descriptive name for easy identification.
keys.enabledDescription: Disabling this key will block all requests using it.
keys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
keys.saveKey: Please copy and securely save this key. You will not be able to view it again.
keys.chatCompletionDescription: Call the chat completion API with your key to get a non-streaming response.
keys.streamChatCompletionDescription: Call the chat completion API with your key to get a streaming response.
keys.disableConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable this API key?
keys.enableConfirm: Are you sure you want to enable this API key?
keys.noChannelsAvailable: No channels available. Please add a channel first.
keys.logDetailsDescription: If enabled, detailed request and response bodies will be logged for this API key. Disable for privacy or to save storage.

providers.title: Provider Management
providers.name: Provider Name
providers.nameDescription: Give your provider a unique name.
providers.baseURLDescription: The base URL for the provider's API.
providers.apiKeyDescription: Your provider's API key. This key will be stored securely.
providers.typeDescription: Select the provider type for model loading and specific configurations.
providers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
providers.autoLoadModelsDescription: If enabled, the system will automatically load available models from this provider.
providers.disabledDescription: If enabled, this provider will not be used for routing requests.
providers.enableConfirm: Are you sure you want to enable this provider?
providers.disableConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable this provider?

models.name: Model Name
models.title: Model Management
models.providerSelectionHelp: Hold Ctrl (Windows) or Command (Mac) to select multiple providers.
models.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this model?
models.aliasDescription: A short name or alias for this model, e.g., gpt4
models.channelSelectionDescription: Select one or more channels for this model. You can set a weight for each channel to control routing distribution.
models.noChannelsAvailable: No channels available. Please create a channel first.
models.disabledDescription: If enabled, this model will not be used for routing requests.
models.enableConfirm: Are you sure you want to enable this model?
models.disableConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable this model?

users.title: User Management
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

home.title: Your Intelligent AI Service Gateway
home.description: Unified management of your AI channels, keys, and models with easy integration and intelligent routing.
